about.title: About Us
about.description: We are dedicated to providing the best kitchen services.

hero.title: Welcome to KitchenService
hero.description: We provide top-notch kitchen solutions tailored to your needs.

service.title: Our Services
service.description: We offer a wide range of kitchen services to meet your needs.

aboutMe.Title: About Me
aboutMe.Description: My name is Daud, and I am a passionate kitchen installer with over 10 years of experience in the industry. I love turning kitchen dreams into reality and take pride in delivering the highest quality craftsmanship. For me, every project is unique, and I always strive to exceed my clients' expectations.

aboutCompany.Title: About Our Company
aboutCompany.Description: TERLO Kitchen Installation was founded in 2002 with one goal: to offer custom kitchen solutions that combine functionality and aesthetics. Over the years, we have had the pleasure of working with a wide range of clients, from private homeowners to larger companies. Our success is based on trust, quality, and a personal approach to every project.

aboutSkills.Title: Our Expertise
Description: Design and customization of kitchen solutions.
Repair and maintenance of kitchen appliances.
